messageBody:
Hello Experts

I am quite new in Junit . I have written some small test cases .

I would like to know how to write test case for the following class.

1. This class has a couple of setter/getter methods .

How do I write test cases for setter/getter methods ?

2. This class has a method

public vector getMaterials(int param).

It connects to database and gets some records . This records are

then inserted into a vector and returned .

How do I test this case ? Please explain me in details

..

bye
